content.new:
This bug is related to and possibly a duplicate of issue #543 and issue #509.

Using a ray sensor attached to another link through a fixed joint produces weird behavior when the rotation of the fixed joint is non-zero.

This behavior includes seeing

issue.title: Incorrect ray sensor behavior when attached to fixed joint with rotation
